items.sentence: The last thing I want to do is give you any reason to fire me.
The last time I saw Tom he was with an attractive young woman.
There\'s no doubt in my mind that Tom was planning to do that.
This is the first time I\'ve invited Tom to one of my parties.
Tom said that it wasn\'t his fault and he blamed Mary instead.
Tom said that no matter what happened, he\'d always love Mary.
A kiss without a mustache is like a bowl of soup with no salt.
Tom has done a pretty good job concealing his dissatisfaction.
Tom and Mary looked embarrassed when John caught them kissing.
Tom and Mary sat at a small table in the garden playing chess.
Tom and Mary sat on a bench in the park talking to each other.
Tom and Mary sat on the couch, flipping through a photo album.
Are you going to buy that dress you were looking at yesterday?
Tom left early this morning, so he should be in Boston by now.
When you\'ve finished reading that book, I\'d like to read it.
I\'ve been trying to get a hold of you for the past two hours.
It was difficult for me to find the entrance to that building.
Tom got lost in the woods and ended up in someone\'s backyard.
Tom grabbed Mary\'s fishing pole to help her pull in the fish.
You should be able to do that without anyone\'s help, I think.
